column4: does anyone know how to execute setup.exe from CD ? I installed wine but when i try execute the exe it says  that i need to add execute bit but I cant add execute bit since CD is read only file system. Any ideas?
anyone know how to execute exe file from cd?
wine: '/home/Awesom-O' is not owned by you, refusing to create a configuration directory there
any ideas how to fix it?
chmod: changing permissions of `/media/INSTALL/setup.exe': Read-only file system
i can't change file permission since CD is read only
i did on VMware but all ok ~
what version of VMware you use?
i have that version too but i cant log on with out using virtual keyboad. Can you enter your  password normally in logon screen
hmm strange what keyboard you use? usb/ps2?
I am using ps2 keyboard could that be problem?
i don't think so ~ VMware simulate ps/2 any way
